rooms.description: Open area with foyer, closet, and storage near entrance
Spacious living area with Bohemian decor elements, floor-to-ceiling windows along the east side to maximize natural light
Open dining space integrated into the living area
Well-equipped kitchen with an island counter, adjacent utility space and built-in storage
Cozy room on ground floor for guests with a view of the central courtyard
Private bathroom attached to guest room
Service area including laundry and storage, ensuring functionality
